topic: philippines evacuates 3,000 people after activity increases at mayon volcano

text: Breaking news is coming in from the Philippines where a massive evacuation effort is underway
A massive evacuation effort is underway due to increased activity at the infamous Mayon volcano
Thousands of people are scrambling for safety
At least 3,000 people have been evacuated from the surrounding areas as a precautionary measure
The evacuation order was issued to prevent any potential harm from the volcanic activity

identity_keyword: Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology
text: The Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology has confirmed increased seismic activity
The evacuees are being temporarily housed in nearby shelters
They are being provided with food and other essential supplies
Local authorities are working to ensure their basic needs are met during this time
It remains to be seen whether the increased activity will lead to a full-scale eruption
Scientists and emergency responders are closely monitoring the situation
The fate of the people in the surrounding areas hangs in the balance
